general.description: Rhaana is one of the outer worlds of Dvaered control. The population is high, but forced to live in insulated containment centres. It is a poor world, with little to recommend it to the wider galaxy. Thusly, it's very quiet.
general.bar: The bar is a standard-issue model, seen in most space stations. Other than that, it is as overlarge and dingy as any Dvaered bar.
